channel.title: Need help with my allstar
channel.description:
I'm working on a ticket shop what you can buy stuff from with tickets but I don't know what the code is to add a new type of kinda like money! could anyone help me I also need help with something to my server has a glitch where if you double click login it will let the other person on even if the password is wrong i'm thinking the problem will be in player.java
reply if have the code for tickets pm me if you know how to fix the glitch!

item.title: Need help with my allstar
item.dc:creator: @blddyboy blddyboy
item.description:
@blddyboy wrote:

as far as I know it’s not a client problem it’s the source what is messing it up I think it’s because the double click thing I added for my empty inventory but I tested it before but I think I didn’t get the hole code out so i’m going to look in to it.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with my allstar
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

[quote=“blddyboy, post:1, topic:426511”]I’m working on a ticket shop what you can buy stuff from with tickets but I don’t know what the code is to add a new type of kinda like money! could anyone help me I also need help with something to my server has a glitch where if you double click login it will let the other person on even if the password is wrong i’m thinking the problem will be in player.java

reply if have the code for tickets pm me if you know how to fix the glitch![/quote]

You could add an exception underneath your Shops method where the GP is defined as currency. I don’t recommend you do this though. You should implement a system in your Shops Configuration file to read which currency which shops use. As far as the Password glitch goes, try what Clawz Fury said. Also, check your capitalization method.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with my allstar
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

For the tickets check the a currency tutorial, and for the glitch check your login method (initialize(), or run()) in your Client class. This could also be a client sided fix too.

Read full topic
